Package it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.BoardElements

Class Student

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.BoardElements.BoardPiece
it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.BoardElements.Student
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Student extends BoardPiece
Models the Student piece as a BoardPiece. To avoid meaningless updates, it doesn't have an owner but only a container.
